name: Love Language Japanese
description: Enter your first year at Koto Gakuen and discover Japanese language through easy to learn lessons and compelling mini games. Meet new friends and unveil their story and maybe find love through your adventures.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 1.66 Ghz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB RAM DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 1 GB available space
